original_text: From the Israelites' half, Moses took one part out of every 50. He gave those to the Levites who took care of the Lord's special tent. That was what the Lord had commanded Moses to do.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 그 절반에서 모세가 사람이나 짐승의 오십분의 일을 취하여 여호와의 장막을 맡은 레위인에게 주었으니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하심과 같았더라

sentences.original_text: Moses took one part out of every 50
He gave those to the Levites
who took care of the Lord's special tent
That was what the Lord had commanded Moses to do
